Content: Ever since the update, my app is delaying messages by almost 30 minutes if not opened. Checked the servermanagement and the background connection on my blackberry keyone. Application also crashes and sometimes wont even open until i repeatedly close it. Network Connection also causes it to log out at times.
OK but crashes a lot
Old version was buggy and crashed. The new version lacks features but is getting better .
Crashing

This was a great app but now tbh it's useless! Constantly have trouble sending pictures, loss of connection, the app crashing etc it's starting to get abit boring having all these problems now. Sort it out wickr before we all sack you off for something more reliable!
Crashing again, not able to start app, even after last update, get this fixed asap!!!
Worked fine for two days and now will not load. Crashes immediately. Garbage app
App can't even open since last update, immediate crash - hotfix this garbage NOW
Frequent app crashes on opening the app. Only lets you share 1 picture at a time. Fix these issues and I'll add one star. Otherwise OK secure messenger.
Crashes every time i try to open it

Usually its great but recently will NOT open or stop crashing. Needs fixing guys im sending urgent and important messages using it and it needs to be more reliable. Will give 5 stars when this is sortes.
Stopped working have to uninstall and install to make it work for a bit then crashes again. Please fix this
Was great until last 2 updates. Can't even open now. Just crashes over and over

App crashes quite regulary and messages get lost in the system somehow.. the amount of times people send me a message and i get a notification but the message doesnt show up on my phone and i have to get them to resend the messagr is scary. This also happens when i send messages sometimes too. Not happy wickr. Will be switching to signal private messenger as that app works perfectly

This app seems to have a ton of bugs at the moment making it very hard to use effectively. For example, I cannot look at messages from contacts by clicking on the conversation . I have to find their contact in the contacts list then open the conversation from there. In addition, the search seems to crash regularly.

This app is absolutely awful and runs badly on the Samsung Galaxy s7 on Android N and the Asus Zenpad S 8.0 with Android M. Every time you open the app to view a new message, it will sit there with a black screen for 10 seconds and eventually crash. Force close, reopen, then you can finally see the message. When the app does work, it constantly has to log itself in when opening it. This app is garbage, low-quality software. Even their Windows desktop app is a hot mess, poorly designed and looks ugly. These people don't know what they're doing and are terrible software developers.

I've been using this app for a couple of months. It's a great secure messaging solution and I love it. The latest update has a few major issues though which is why I'm rating it two stars. I no longer receive any notifications for new messages. Occasionally I'll send a message that dissappears from the log within seconds, leaving me unsure of whether it sent or not. The app is also constantly crashing. I have to wait for the not responding notice to click on close in order for it to actually restart and begin working properly. I can't simply close the app from the window switcher. It just goes back to the unresponsive app. Those are the only reasons I'm giving Wickr this rating. Aside from that it's great and I will update this review once the issues are fixed. Please do this soon Wickr! Notifications being the main one. Those are pretty important in order to get back to someone in a timely manner.
No longer operational. Freezes upon launch, uninstalled and reinstalled. Nothing. Please update the bugs!
Absolutely terrible. Worked for 2 days and now it crashes when I try to open it.
Cant even get past the register or login screen. It just freezes. This is on my note 8
It looks good but my friend couldn't save what I sent and when I tried to send a video it crashed.
Keeps crashing all the time.
Crashes constantly

It glitches ALL THE TIME, but all my friends use it so I'm stuck putting up with it. Notifications never work and it crashes every other time I send a message. I have a galaxy s7, not sure if that has anything to do with the constant shutting down.
Keeps crashing. All the freaking damn time. Its infuriating and frustrating. Fix ur bugs or whatever. Not happy.
Crashes all the time.
App you to work phenomenally before the most recent major update (that added new UI) New update always crashes, logs me out occasionally, and fails to send notifications when they are enabled.
This app would be perfect, but crashes are a daily occurrence. It is very frustrating.

Was a great intact I would go as far as saying it was the best secure messanger on the market but with the new UI some things are better but it crashes more but the absolute wort thing is group messaging is limited to just 10 people this for me all the other improvements worthless as I would trade them all for larger group size
Horrible. It crashes constantly and slows my new note 8.
Used to work great but can't open it anymore on my Moto E4. Crashes on startup
Used to be great. Now crashes on startup.
Crashes daily... Please fix. App could be amazing.
crashes way too much

This app would be a godsend if it didn't crash Everytime I open it or send a message. Nothing more aggravating then typing out an entire message and upon hitting the send button the app crashes and message is lost. You start at square one again. Boooo! This app is super buggy.
Absolute garbage since the update. Crash, bugs, the lot. Get signal instead.
Avoid Since the new wickr me the app is unusable , crashes all the time. But worst is that you can't delete messages . This is on going problem that wickr team seems not to care .

Was working good until the last big update. Now notifications don't work half the time. Crashes on opening half the time. "Delete chat and all data" just adds a message at the bottom saying "room deleted" but leaves the full convo in tact. Switching to Signal.

Update ruined it. It's buggy now. Often crashes or freezes. Other problems: 1. Screen shots are now allowed. Why would you do that? Like many, I liked that feature that blocked screen shots. Sure someone could in theory get it anyway (picture with another device, cast screen, etc ) but it was a good deterrent. @Wickr You guys had a great product with the old version. If you wanted to charge for it, I would have gladly paid for it (or make a free version and paid gets extra options or something) However this current version is atrocious.

Before the forced update, except for some stability issues, Wickr was PERFECT! The new version, even with succeeding updates, is just crappy. -pictures takes long to load, timer starts as soon as message is tapped, not when it is displayed; a pic timed for 1 minute will never be displayed -the functionality press and hold to view pix is gone (can you perhaps make this an option?), -timed authentication is gone (switching from Wickr to another app then back to Wickr would require you to re-login), -recalling messages makes the app crash each and every time, and will sometimes fail to recall on the other side or across devices, -screenshot notification is gone, -sender no longer has control of message, receiver may be able to export file (doesn't this defeat the purpose of transient messages in the first place? If i wanted the receiver to save the file, I would have emailed it or use viber/whatsapp), -app crashes a lot more than the old version (tested on Oreo and Marshmallow)
Since the latest update the app won't even open. Crashes during launch.
app seems to be very unstable, constantly crashing.

It used to be the best, but the update that changed the GUI destroyed it. Default destruction settings are gone, the app crashes frequently, the cache takes 80+ MB more in data use every day. They took something that was good and made it a pain to use.
New update make the app become worse than ever Frequent crash ,unable to delete message at will....
Sooo buggy. Only 1 time in 100 can I manage to read my messages without the app crashing. Takes a day or so to tell me I've got a message - if at all.. It's just painful. Get it right fellas.

Have to reboot my Note5 *every* *single* *time* I send or receive a message on latest version as the app crashes whenever it is subsequently started. Force stop doesn't help nor does clearing the memory using Smart Manager or Android Assistant.

Ive used this app for a couple years and it has been good right up until the last update... Once the update was completed i became locked out of my account for 24hrs because the app crashed whilst logging in. After being able to log in, the app crashes every time i run the app, after about 4seconds. Using a samsung galaxy s7 edge and have been since release. Ive had wickr on this device also since.

The app is constantly crashing/not responding as soon as I try to open a message or send a message the app will crash and boot me out causing me to log back in again. Also the app makes my phone run slow.. this app is basically unusable
Could put up with the bugs and crashes for the end to end encryption but now I cannot delete old conversations I'm about to stop using it unless this is fixed in a not too distant update
Keeps crashing on ZTE Zmax Pro running Android 6.0.1. Would be great if it wasn't so buggy.
Even flakier than the previous version, crashing all the time
Constantly crashes on start. Renders it unusable
It keeps crashing on HTC One M9+
Crashes every time I use it

App used to be great. Since update it crashes every time you switch focus away from the app without being inside a convo. Have to restart, potentially multiple times, to get it to stop crashing back to home screen when attempting to open a conversation.

This app became garbage after this last update. Unstable across the board and more vulnerable than ever. Enduring 40+ crashes a day. Go use signal until it's stabilized or if they add 2FactorAuthentication.

Absolutely useless. Wickr fails to log in 9 out of 10 times, it crashes all the time and its even crashing when I don't have the app open at all. You guys seriously ruined Wickr with this new update. Not recommended at all. Switching to signal as it actually works. Thanks for nothing.
New update has made the app become useless, won't sign in and if I do manage to it crashes every time I try to read a message. What a waste of an app. Everything worked fine before this update.
Used to be 4/5 with a few bugs but now its really bad, logging in 15 times beacuse of constant crashes, you're able to see chats when prompted to login for about 1 second, worst privacy
Ruined a great app. Doesnt notify me when new messages come in, and crashes all the time. Why havent you fixed it yet?
New update renders the entire app useless. Pitted with bugs and glitches. I'm struggling to log in and if I'm lucky enough to get past that stage, it'll most likely crash.
POS.. constantly crashes.. now says suspended... And contact admin. With no way to contact admin. Junkie messenger, lost all my communications. Horrible.
New update is horiffic. Can't message friends that haven't updated and keeps crashing. Why wreck a good thing?!
Use to be a great app. Now it crashes all the time and struggles to login. Goodbye to a great app
Please fix keeps crashing im using lg g3

I really liked this app until the latest update...now it crashes every time I get a message. I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling and it still crashes. I'm trying to bear with it until these bugs get fixed, but it literally crashes every time i open the app and every time I get a message, the app unexpectedly has to close and restart. This is just a little more than ridiculous...please get this fixed! It was just fine before the update and I've had nothing but problems since.

This app is HORRIBLE do not use it. I have been using it for 3 years and this update they did a few weeks ago is the worst ever! The app crashes every time. I have family traveling abroad in the morning so I'm glad I checked this app tonight..its garbage. Now I have to find a new app tonight and learn it and then teach them before they fly in the morning. I recently sent a message to wickr telling them their "suppprt" is embarrassing and to remove the option. I see they did that because there is no way to message them now. The file shredder option is gone too and so is the voice recorder option. These need to come back ASAP. This app has gotten so bad since the CEO Nico Sell left a few years back. Skip this trash.
new update crash after sending any msg. it logs automatically in, even its disabled. no general setting for autodestruct. huge steps back regarding security! please fix it or lose all users...

EDIT: ok so it’s not so bad, I actually like it. But there are still a few big oopsies, namely stuff like erratic auto login, and the screenshot thing. I also wish self-destruct and burn on read were the same amount by default... I’m not usually one to complain on big updates, I understand there’s a lot that goes into the changes. But this update really is 2 steps backward. Agree with the sentiment of another commenter; old app felt safe, this does not. Wickr was unique for its features over Signal or its ilk and now those are compromised, notably auto logout, and especially burn on read. Without those, even if slightly inconvenient or “uncool” for new users, this is just another E2EE flashy messaging app. Guys, please consider reverting back at least the features (the new look is good), because that and ONLY that are what set wickr apart. Oh and yes, it STILL crashes.

ADDITIONAL REVIEW: Wickr has done two "updates" since the forced update on 8/12. Not sure what has changed to improve the app, it still sucks! The forced update completely destroyed a good app. Developers, please read the reviews and listen to the users. PLEASE ROLL BACK TO PREVIOUS VERSION!! I wish I could leave zero stars! This update is horrific! Most of the changes suck and removes privacy! • Screen shots should not be permitted. •Using the app with my phone in landscape positioning is no longer possible. •Not being able to crop or edit a picture is unthinkable. •Not being able to send a video longer than 5 seconds is ridiculous. Plus, it needs to be an in app option, like a taking a pic. •Not being able to remain logged in stinks. You have no option to remain logged in. •App still crashes!! •Why does the notification display who the message is from?? No good! •New messages shouldn't open all at once when receiving multiple messages from one person. The timer starts immediately on all messages! •Need to be able to select a notification sound and not have to use my device's default sound. •Why must it vibrate when a new message is received?? Not quiet! •The timer options of message destruction are a joke! There's 10 seconds, 1 minute and 10 minutes plus longer ones. How about something inbetween 1 and 10 minutes?? •The previous version may have crashed all the time but it was better than this garbage. •ROLL BACK TO THE PREVIOUS VERSION!!
Since the update, this application continues to crash on Android. I've reinstalled, cleared dalvik cache, etc to no avail...
New update is super buggy. Keeps crashing whenever trying to send a message.
New update sucks crashes all the time and screen constantly loads and freezes
Crashing Crashes since the last update

Unlike most, I prefer this so far. Wickr always looked ugly and crashed. It definitely looks better, I'll see how it works. Big problem, thiugh--I see no option to turn off notification sounds. I'm either blind, or someone was just insane for not offering that.

Good update wickr. Crashes on launch this app has been amazing. Until 4:16pm on August 15, 2017... After reinstalled it worked for a few hours. Then same error occured. Again reinstalled and fixed it. We will see how long it works again. The app itaelf is useful and I like it. These crashes are tiresome.
Crashes every time I attempt to tske a photo. No video options. Now allows receiver to take screenshots, definitely not secure any more. I would prefer to go back to the original version
The newest update ruined the app. EDIT: It crashes as soon as I press the app icon. This happens both on my XCover 2 and Huawei Mediapad.

seems pretty secure, but everything has it's weakness. crashes a lot, but recovers very rapidly after self restart. one missing feature (maybe I just haven't found it again in the settings) with the latest update - custom sound notification! my alerts sound just like every other default alert. need to add feature again if missing. interface kinda sucks, but it's pretty functional once you can find things.

Complete rubbish!!!! Use to be OK. Then the updates made it so unstable that it crashed all the time. Other end didn't receive messages and so on....... I mean all the time. Well now I can't even contact my friends if they have not updated the app.

Crashes a lot. Before the update i would never get notifications even though notifications were turned on in both setting for the app and my phone settings. Since the new update i cant even open the app. Keeps saying the app keeps stopping.
New update is really bad was nothing wrong before crashes a lot dont get notifications when I should and need to bring back manual secure shreds asap!!
Love The idea but after update keeps crashing making the app unusable. And also feel it can use more colours in ui
App worked great until new update, now keeps crashing... hopefully another update to fix this soon or will be losing a lot of downloads
This app was good for private messaging. Now I don't know what to think with the new crash date
No longer works. Crashes shortly after opening

After the update, app just crashes after two seconds of use. Old version was much more stable and from the sounds of it had better features. If its not broken dont fix it Wikr, I would do a roll back because this version needs more testing

Used to be a good app prior to this update. Less control, harder to use, more annoying and crashing more often equal drop the app unless rectified soon. Don't really want to leave the app but this update is so bad I am seriously considering alternatives . Some things I could live with for the benefits but at present benefits are out weighed by the problems
Crashes all the time. Redphone app by snowden is alot better but its not free. Msgs take forever to send and recieve. Might as well just use whatsapp
Update has ruined it. Can no longer communicate with my contacts as they haven't updated. I've had all sort of password issues, and if keeps crashing. Shame, it was good. No longer.
Useless! Constantly crashing. This new version is completely useless. And there is no way to get info to or from Wickr so I'm SOL. It was buggy before, now it is complete trash.
Love the update. Previous version kept crashing on my S8+. Finally have a stable build. And now we can attach memes. My group loves it. Thanks for finally making this worthy of using.
App completely useless since updates.Crashes almost instantly. Please fix!!!
This update crashes more than it did even before. On top of that I can only message one individual at a time and not in groups. Going to try Signal or Telegram now and bring my team of 20 with me.
Crashed after update to v4.0 ...cleans and reinstall doesn't help. Android 4.1
This app keeps crashes before the update amd crashes even more after the update
Update ruined the app, crashes heaps old features were better, doesn't feel like it's as secure as the old version, I recommended this to everyone I know now I wouldn't recommend it to anybody.

This App was Amazing 3 Versions ago
App doesn't Crash as much as the last update but am constantly having to re-install now because it doesn't decrypt incoming messages or even receive them about %10 of the time, I am reinstalling this thing to make it work properly at least twice a week. Support is almost never helpful since they take days to reply if they even reply at all.

False security, is not security at all. The developer has ignored the countless reports of bugs and exploits allowing access to a stored private key, and even interception of "encrypted messages. Ever wondered why it crashes all the time? Most exploits involve crashing the client. This is NOT E2E encryption. I'll stick with open source, and auditable code.

Crashes when opening
Didn't use to be this way but lately it crashes within seconds of opening. Cant even read a message. Hit the report button, seems to be about as effective as Microsoft error reporting... And yes I've u installed and reinstalled countless times which is a short term fix before the problem resurfaces. No I'm not rooted

Well it's free. And sometimes it works. Other times it crashes, or fails to send messages. It's not uncommon to have to resend your message multiple times before it goes through. Also I don't always get notifications when I receive a message....only sometimes. Fix the bugs and it could be a 4 star app.

App is amazing on apple, pc, everything excerpt android. It's too bad because it's use it on a day to day basis. Problems - can't open incoming messages at least once a day - once it stops decrypting messages it never works until I reinstall - need to reinstall at least once a day - crashes occasionally - no popup notifications on home screen although the do show on drop down menu (blackberry priv)

Only works sometimes. Very inconsistent.
Older versions worked better. Sometimes I receive messages and I cannot open them. Can't delete them either. Very frustrating. Sometimes I'll send a msg and check back later to discover it never sent. Also frustrating. They keep updating the UI but it really just needs an overhaul on the actual messaging stuff. Frills don't mean anything If the product is not reliable, and this is definitely not reliable. Oh yeah and it crashes CONSTANTLY....like 20x a day. Would type more but reached limit.

Great but doesn't work on Android The reason I gave 5 stars is because I have it on iOS and Linux desktop and know how great this app is, but it has never worked correctly on Android. I have tried for 2 months now and as soon as I login it crashes every time.

It's okay for a messaging app. Would like to have a read receipt though & a pin for logins so I don't have to type my password all the time. App has been crashing a lot lately too & not sending messages.

Crashes Worked great and now crashes frequently. I receive messages I am unable to open or read which makes a message app kinda useless. How did you destroy something that was working fine as it was? Very close to uninstalling as in current form completely useless.

Could do better. B-
What should be a great app, is spoiled (for me) by a lack of working notifications. No pop ups, no tray notifications, no sound, no vibration. Also, there is a massive lag with message delivery and the messages have to be clicked manually to unlock. Finally, the frequent crashing doesn't help things. The iOS version is almost flawless in comparison.

Absolutely love this app, but I've been having major issues lately. Constantly crashing. Everytime i open it crashes then reopens normally. Also if I turn on ultra power saving. It won't notify me of any messages and I have to reinstall the app. Galaxy S6 edge+ is my phone I use. Hopefully these errors are fixed on the next update or I may have to switch to signal.

Keeps crashing Won't let me open it .. not happy with it... when it did work at times wouldn't let me open messages.. I have Uninstalled and reinstalled it but than lost my account..made new one worked for a few days and now crashes

Won't download properly I' v.e been using Wickr for a few years and have really liked it. I had to reinstall the app a couple days ago and After DL (4g and WiFi) then logging in it freezes...tried 4 times same result...please help

It was good. :-(
Like others have mentioned this was once very good and reliable. Alas the latest versions have proven to be very crash prone and unreliable. :-( Instant Messaging is now often slow with as many as 8 or more messages suddenly arriving at one time. I still use it but wish they would correct the faults they have introduced.

This app has been great the past year or so. The new update has meant constant crashing if the app/network errors. Gonna see if uninstalling then reinstalling will work. Photos don't load wither which means I am now missing out on seeing photos.

When I works its great, but it tends to be feel buggy. And now, all of a sudden it is crashing constantly, can't add friends, can't send messages. Really, really annoying. Tried reinstalling, tried on different devices all for the same result. Please please fix asap

Mehh
If the claims the company makes are credible then it's certainly worth using it. However even with a good internet connection I have constant transmission problems and crashes. I used it over signal because I liked that you don't have to hand out your phone number but I've switched to signal now and it just works worlds better. I didn't want to switch but wickr just didn't work for me.

Wikr review I'm a new user of this application and I like the idea of it but it crashes everytime I open it now. I would like to keep it installed but until this bug is fixed I'll be deleting it. We should be allowed our privacy and you have given us that with this app. It just needs to work properly now.

Good: Secure infrastructure and good for privacy vs. more mainstream messaging apps with privacy or security limitations. Has a desktop version as well. Bad: App crashes frequently (several times per week) and often fails to send or receive messages without any warning or alert.

A great program but the bugs quickly becoming an overwhelming annoyance. Constant crashes, messages not sent or received, not recognizing a valid password at login. I love the app but it seems to become increasingly unstable within days of install. Edit: As I use it I'm growing increasingly frustrated with the increasing amount of crashes. Pretty much useless at this point.

if i could give no stars i would. This app never works well. It crashes all the time and now with the latest update it doesnt decrypt messages. Sort it out wikr because its an amazing concept but needs alot of work

Once Great, Now Abandoned
This app used to be awesome. It was smooth and flawless. I'm disappointed at what has happened to it. It's like the developers just packed up their bags and left without a word. Seriously, are they not going to fix messages not sending or receiving half the time? Are they not going to fix constant crashes? It is sad, really, that a once flawless and beautiful app was abandoned. It's been months and fixes haven't been issued. 3 stars because I still have a sliver of hope that the devs will listen and fix it.

Unreliable. Both the Android app and the Windows desktop app are clunky and crash often. Same errors on multiple Android & Win devices, so it's not the device's fault. Needs major stability work. Great concept, poor execution.
Will re-rate in future Great app for its intended use. Would like to see a few ui profiles (dark ui!) A little more stability (crashes, usually when closing). Other than that, great

This app used to be amazing. But now as of 1 hour ago it was fine and I logged in to have it tell me account has been suspended and to contact a system admin. This app is absolutely terrible. Glitches out like crazy every time I use it. Constant reloads and crashing.

I rename this app Crashy McCrash App. I even had a message sent a 01Jan1970. Great programming skill is needed to make something that crashes so much. Of course when you have programmers this bad doing encryption it likely means they are using ROT13, and then messing it up by running the XOR twice. Tox is better, and doesn't crash.

Used to be a lot better. Now, even after restarting phone (up to date Sony Z3C) and re-installing the program it keeps crashing for no reason whatsoever and insists on not notifying on new messages. The problems aren't big, but quite irritating for the end user; one star off for each.
This app constantly crashes. It will not allow me to open messages. I have yo Uninstall then re-install the app several times. Can someone please advise the issue with this.

What the hell?? (Issues fixed) Changed my profile. Now I can't log in 90% of the time. It crashes 9 times out of 10. I won't send my messages 4 times out of 5. I don't get notifications when I receive messages anymore. Had none of these issues before I changed my profile. (Sony Xperia Z3 Compact)
Cant use it. Crash after crash after crash. Uninstall, reinstall and mow it says the password i just made to sign up is incorrect!! I WANT MY USERNAME. and Account functionality
crashes constantly on note 6 edge. have to reinstall everytime it happens because it just won't stop crashing. it was a good app that's why i gave it 3 stars but it sure has problems atm

Android not as good as iOS & Crashes Wikr is a pretty good app, but it's better on iOS. Wikr on Android is missing the ability to check multiple messages if you are manually deleting them. Which means you have to one at a time delete messages. Since the latest Android update the App now crashes when you try to login. Totally unuseable.

I love the idea but it's now an embarrassment Crashing more than ever. Must be ramping up for the corporate version which won't be free. I used to recommend to everyone. I can't even open messages half the time. New phone, fresh updates/downloads and installs. Still behaving very poorly

Great app but requires some updating. I've had multiple crashes and problems with infinite load times logging in which is currently happening. Would very much appreciate an update to try and resolve these issues. Other than that its all around excellent

This is a terrible, buggy, unstable app, literally the worst IM app I've ever used. It loses messages, doesn't notify you when messages arrive, indicates you have messages when there are none, won't let you decrypt messages when they arrive, requires a dozen retries to send out a single message, crashes a lot, it's like something written by a student learning to program as their first ever app. At the moment I'm communicating with friends who have Wickr via SMS, it's that bad. It's actually worse than useless because I have to use unprotected, government-monitored communications because Wickr is so unusable. Avoid this mess and go with something that works like WhatsApp or Signal.
Overall the app is great. It just crashes a lot for me and my friend. Whenever we try to invite each other (add wickr id), it crashes. Awkward.

Im reinstalling this almost daily. It doesnt notify me of messages, sometimes it doesnt send them, or sends them but immediately dissapears on my phone so i dont even know if it sent. Or i cant open something ive recieved. Its crashing daily also. It wasnt to bad in the start but now its getting worse. I love the features just wish i could use it properly
Great app but crash's sometimes on Kali Nethunter Android. Also why no dark theme or night mode so it's easier on the eyes. Or am I just missing where that option is?
Has Started Crashing Nonstop! It was working fine till just recently, and now I can't open it. It won't open at all. Not sure if it's between updates or what, but it doesn't work at this time!
App is completely rubbish!! Keeps on crashing, freezing and messages don't go through but disappear of your screen even after uninstalling and reinstalling several times over the last year or so!!

Horrible on my phone. No notifications, crashes all the time, and I have to manually back out of a chat to refresh it because for some reason it doesn't automatically fetch it. Seems to work fine for everyone else.
App is always crashing on kit kat. Everyone I know complains of constant crashing. Looking for better alternative since they never update.

It crashes all the time and messages fail to send or load, and sometimes end up with incorrect time stamps that put them at the top of the messages where I don't even see them. This was all annoying enough, but now I can't even log in! It says I have a network error and that's bull crap since my connection is fine. I've reinstalled and restarted my phone 1,000 times to no avail. Please fix this.

Wickr used to be good. But not any longer!
This app used to work flawlessly. But it just reached the point that it was constant battle of the app crashing, not sending messages, not working correctly. I just reinstalled it today after about a 2 month break and it's crashed at least 10 times, it failed to send at least 5 messages. The worst part is that you don't learn that the message wasn't sent until you log back into the app. I sincerely hope they can get this figured out but it doesn't work well for my Samsung S5.
Great when i can use it but crashes CONSTANTLY! Android platform crashes, that bad its been happenimg for 3 months now to use it i must uninstall then re install
The best Sometimes messages delays, sometimes crashes if I open messages on more then 3 devices at once. But other then that cross platform support and true encryption it's the best.
A good im client but with issues Right now the one issue is the crashing on my phone, heck it "swolled" 2 messages and its refusing to bring those back
Good potential, have only been using for a short while but sometimes you have to open and close the app a couple of times so you can view an incoming message. Crashed once so far.
This app crashes as soon as I start it. I've reinstalled several times, then my account got locked when I tried to get in, but I know all the info I typed was correct. Good stuff..
Crashes CONSTANTLY, all day long now. Not only does it crash constantly, messages wont open now. Was a great app in previous versions, but not anymore. Extremely disappointed.

New update worked briefly then stopped. Reset phone and made new account but still gives errors. The previous version also had a lot of bugs that made it crash and otherwise nonfunctional...I don't remember anything like this when I first started

1. Extremely buggy. Crashes, delayed messages, undelivered messages, bugged notifications. Good concept, very poor execution
Wickr offers military grade encryption with memory shredding, which are key to true software security. I am not an expert, just an advanced amateur, but the security level of Wickr is impressive. I also liked the idea how the Wickr Team designed the technical background, it suggests good professional practice. On the other hand, the implementation and user experience are terrible. Messages are often lost, not synchronized among devices, there are regular hickups with connection, etc. (with a reliable, high speed European service provider). Opened messages are still stuck as unopened (red lock). The linux desktop client (v2.2.2) crashes 2 times out of 3 runs, but there are regular crashes and hangups with the Android app too (v.2.4+). All these issues were reported to the Wickr Team months ago. The constant sync problems, the crashes and the really bad user experience render the app almost unusable. Just to illustrate my point: there are only 2 of us left from a group of 7, and noone is really convinced that we should continue using the app. Would I recommend? Only if you are a masochist or has no other alternative (which I am looking for).
